location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Colonel William Earle, Military Secretary to the Viceroy, Simla to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a request from the Doctor (Surgeon Major William Eddowes) with the Erinpoora [Erinpura] Force to be considered for the vacancy with the Deolee [Deoli] Force when its Doctor (Surgeon Major Frederick William Alexander De Fabeck) goes on furlough; and regarding Sir Frederick Haines sending Major John Campbell Gunning's history sheet.
